city.name: Hongkong
city.peakDescr: The highest point in Hong Kong, offering stunning panoramic views of the city, harbor, and surrounding islands. You can take the historic Peak Tram to the summit.
city.parkDescr: Located next to Chi Lin Nunnery in Diamond Hill, Nan Lian Garden is a Tang Dynasty-style garden adorned with antique timber structures and beautifully landscaped with trees, rocks and water features that offers a rich variety of photographic topics to photo lovers.
city.disneylandDescr: A theme park with attractions, shows, and meet-and-greets with Disney characters. A great spot for family fun.
city.templeDescr: One of Hong Kong’s oldest and most famous temples, dedicated to the gods of literature and war. It’s a place to see traditional rituals and architecture.
city.islandDescr: The largest island in Hong Kong, known for its natural beauty and attractions such as the Big Buddha (Tian Tan Buddha) and Po Lin Monastery. Enjoy scenic views of Lantau Island and Victoria Harbor while riding the Ngong Ping 360 cable car.
city.harbourDescr: Enjoy the ambiance of the city at night from one of the famous Aqua Luna boats.
